contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kokawa'''|粉河町|Kokawa-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Naga District, Wakayama|Naga District]], [[Wakayama Prefecture|Wakayama]], [[Japan]]. On November 11, 2005 Kokawa was merged with the towns of [[Kishigawa, Wakayama|Kishigawa]], [[Momoyama, Wakayama|Momoyama]], [[Naga, Wakayama|Naga]] and [[Uchita, Wakayama|Uchita]], all from [[Naga District, Wakayama|Naga District]], to form the new city of [[Kinokawa, Wakayama|Kinokawa]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 16,344 and a [[population density|density]] of 210.27 persons per km². The total area was 77.73 km². ==External links== *{{ja icon}} [http://www.town.kokawa.wakayama.jp/ Official town website] [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Wakayama Prefecture]] {{Wakayama-geo-stub}}
